channel.title: Can you edit tooltips server sided? [PI]
channel.description: I've always wondered this. Can you edit a tooltip (the yellow box that shows when you hover a skill) via the server. Also is it possible to edit the text that shows in the top left corner from the server or no?

item.title: Can you edit tooltips server sided? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:508284”]There is no packet to change the tooltip in the upper left for an interface, but its easy to make.

And since the yellow box tooltips just use the disabled text, you can use the packet to change interface text to do so. I think its 126 in 317?[/quote]
Uh… Well. How do I just make a packet?

Read full topic
item.source: Can you edit tooltips server sided? [PI]

item.title: Can you edit tooltips server sided? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

There is no packet to change the tooltip in the upper left for an interface, but its easy to make.

And since the yellow box tooltips just use the disabled text, you can use the packet to change interface text to do so. I think its 126 in 317?

Read full topic
